decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Doc. B, no date; received 19/11/2013; 13/150/GWRH/101/A, dated 05/2013, received 09/05/13; 13/150/GWRH/102, dated 05/2013, received 09/05/13; and 13/150/GWRH/103, dated 05/2013, received 09/05/13) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 3 - The outbuilding hereby permitted shall not be occupied at any time other than for purposes ancillary to the residential use of the dwelling known as 150 Great West Road.  It shall not be used for business purposes and shall not contain primary residential accommodation including sleeping accommodation, kitchen or bathroom accommodation.

Condition : 4 - The extension hereby permitted shall not be occupied at any time other than for purposes ancillary to the residential use of the dwelling known as 150 Great West Road as a single family house.

Condition : 5 - No additional windows or other glazed openings shall be formed in the side walls of the extension hereby approved and no additional doors inserted in the building without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.
description: Application to remove condition 3 of planning permission 00505/150/P1 dated 05/06/2013 requiring removal of existing side doorway in the side extension
